name: Training Programs
description: Goodwill has classes and training programs that will help job seekers enter the Bay Area job market. Some of the many training programs offered: - Digital Training - Warehouse and Logistics Training - Retail Operations Training - Job Search and Work Readiness To learn about upcoming trainings, visit Goodwill's online schedule. Eligibility: - Visit Goodwill's online schedule and select a course to learn about its eligibility criteria. How to Apply: - Register online through the course webpage fou

howToGetIt: Registration is required for all training events and classes. Use REGISTER link for the class or training event you are interested in. For more information, please visit Training Programs
